children.name: bigcommerce_id
children.title: Bigcommerce ID
children.tooltip: The option ID of the BigCommerce system

children.name: name
children.title: Name
children.tooltip: The unique option name, auto-generated from the display name, a timestamp, and the product ID.

children.name: display_name
children.title: Display name
children.tooltip: The name of the option shown on the storefront.

children.name: option_type
children.title: Option type
children.tooltip: he type of option, which determines how it will display on the storefront. Acceptable values: radio_buttons, rectangles, dropdown, product_list, product_list_with_images, swatch. For reference, the former v2 API values are: RB = radio_buttons, RT = rectangles, S = dropdown, P = product_list, PI = product_list_with_images, CS = swatch.

children.name: sort_order
children.title: Sort order
children.tooltip: Order in which the option is displayed on the storefront.

children.name: default_value
children.title: Default value
children.tooltip: (date, text, multi_line_text, numbers_only_text) The default value.

children.name: checked_by_default
children.title: Checked  by default
children.tooltip: Flag for setting the checkbox to be checked by default.

children.name: checkbox_label
children.title: Checkbox label
children.tooltip: Label displayed for the checkbox option.

children.name: date_limited
children.title: Date limited
children.tooltip: Flag to limit the dates allowed to be entered on a date option.

children.name: date_limit_mode
children.title: Date limit mode
children.tooltip: The type of limit that is allowed to be entered on a date option.

children.name: date_earliest_value
children.title: Date earliest value
children.tooltip: The earliest date allowed to be entered on the date option

children.name: date_latest_value
children.title: Date latest value
children.tooltip: The latest date allowed to be entered on the date option

children.name: file_types_mode
children.title: File types mode
children.tooltip: The kind of restriction on the file types that can be uploaded with a file upload option. Values: 'Specific' - restricts uploads to particular file types; 'All' - allows all file types.

children.name: file_types_supported
children.title: File types supported
children.tooltip: The type of files allowed to be uploaded if the 'File type option' is set to 'specific'. Values: images - Allows upload of image MIME types (bmp, gif, jpg, jpeg, jpe, jif, jfif, jfi, png, wbmp, xbm, tiff). documents - Allows upload of document MIME types (txt, pdf, rtf, doc, docx, xls, xlsx, accdb, mdb, one, pps, ppsx, ppt, pptx, pub, odt, ods, odp, odg, odf). other - Allows file types defined in the 'File types other' array.

children.name: file_types_other
children.title: File types other
children.tooltip: A list of other file types allowed with the file upload option.

children.name: file_max_size
children.title: File max size
children.tooltip: (file) The maximum size for a file that can be used with the file upload option. This will still be limited by the server.

children.name: text_characters_limited
children.title: Text characters limited
children.tooltip: Flag to validate the length of a text or multi-line text input.

children.name: text_min_length
children.title: Text min length
children.tooltip: The minimum length allowed for a text or multi-line text option.

children.name: text_max_length
children.title: Text max length
children.tooltip: The maximum length allowed for a text or multi line text option.

children.name: text_lines_limited
children.title: Text lines limited
children.tooltip: (Multi line text) Flag to validate the maximum number of lines allowed on a multi-line text input.

children.name: text_max_lines
children.title: Text max lines
children.tooltip: (Multi line text) The maximum number of lines allowed on a multi-line text input.

children.name: number_limited
children.title: Number limited
children.tooltip: Flag to limit the value of a number option.

children.name: number_limit_mode
children.title: Number limit mode
children.tooltip: The type of limit on values entered for a number option.

children.name: number_lowest_value
children.title: Number lowest value
children.tooltip: The lowest allowed value for a number option if 'Number limited' is checked.

children.name: number_highest_value
children.title: Number highest value
children.tooltip: The highest allowed value for a number option if 'Number limited' is checked.

children.name: number_integers_only
children.title: Number integers only
children.tooltip: Flag to limit the input on a number option to whole numbers only.

children.name: product_list_adjusts_inventory
children.title: Product list adjusts inventory
children.tooltip: Flag for automatically adjusting inventory on a product included in the list.

children.name: product_list_adjusts_pricing
children.title: Product list adjusts pricing
children.tooltip: Flag to add the optional product's price to the main product's price.

children.name: product_list_shipping_calc
children.title: Product list shipping calc
children.tooltip: How to factor the optional product's weight and package dimensions into the shipping quote. Values: none - don't adjust; weight - use shipping weight only; package - use weight and dimensions.
